reviews.text: I was totally confused where this cafe was, but it is in the Wexner Center for the Arts! It was so delicious and a very generous portion. Service was great...
Great salads and tea. Easy to get takeout while walking through the University district.

First of all, gotta love a hidden spot on campus to eat lunch. This place gets pretty busy though! 

They are pretty much Farm to table which is a growing...
